item.title: Pursuing maximum change velocity without violating SLO
item.description: This following content is a transcript from Site Reliability Engineering with some, maybe none, personal adjustments. Product development and SRE teams can enjoy a productive working relationship by eliminating the structural conflict in their respective goals. The structural conflict is between the pace of innovation and product stability. This conflict often is expressed indirectly. In SRE we bring this conflict to the fore, and then resolve it with the introduction of an error budget.
